name: Cavern Lizard
skills: Athletics +5, Stealth +4 (+6 in areas of natural stone or rock)

traits.name: Surprise Attack
traits.desc: If the cavern lizard surprises a creature and hits it with an attack during the first round of combat, the target takes an extra 14 (4d6) damage from the attack.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d10 + 3) piercing damage plus the target is grappled (escape DC 13), and the cavern lizard can’t grapple another target.
